attributes.action: Return all services to the vale hospital and stop further cuts and closure
attributes.background: The vale of leven hospital has been cut to the bone. Thus putting the life's of those who live and work in the vale of leven area at risk. The community need a local hospital and all its services returned. There is leaked documents of further cuts in local media.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
